name: Whole Building Electrification
description: $4,250+ for removing ALL gas appliances and installing electric alternatives (heat pump heating, heat pump water heating, electric/induction cooking, electric dryer); for single-family, multi-family low-rise, and ADUs
fullDescription: The Energy Smart Homes program provides incentives for fully electrifying homes by removing all gas appliances and switching to efficient electric alternatives.
whatTheyOffer:
- $4,250+ total incentive for full electrification
- Heat pump HVAC system incentive
- Heat pump water heater incentive
- Induction cooking incentive
- Electric dryer incentive
- Covers single-family homes
- Covers multi-family low-rise and ADUs
howToGetIt:
1. Plan to replace ALL gas appliances with electric
2. Apply through Energy Smart Homes website
3. Get quotes from contractors
4. Complete installation of all electric appliances
5. Submit documentation for rebate
6. Receive incentive after verification
